title: Slay Belle Surprise Icon
body: On the snowdown lol site it shows 100% completion for the Slay Belle Surprise Icon yet it has not appeared in the lol client. I have also waited a few hours and it has still not appeared.

replies.body: First off it may take a few *days* (not necessarily a few hours) to appear. Secondly, to repeat what others have said, it appears down the page of icons a bit.
Have you tried scrolling through your icons page the slay belle icon is an old one so its somewhere in the middle of your icons page. Same thing happend to me :3
As mentioned above, it'll be further down the page, awkwardly enough where last year's slay belle icon would be.
24 hrs sir, and it is at the down page a bit.
